class.name: BicubicSplineInterpolator

method.name: interpolate
method.comment: Samples (first index is y-coordinate, i.e. subarray variable is x)
For each line y[j] (0 <= j < yLen), construct a 1D spline with
For each line x[i] (0 <= i < xLen), construct a 1D spline with
respect to variable y generated by array fY_1[i]
Partial derivatives with respect to x at the grid knots
Partial derivatives with respect to y at the grid knots

javadoc.text: Computes the next index of an array, clipping if necessary. * It is assumed (but not checked) that {@code i >= 0}.
javadoc.param: max Upper limit of the array.

javadoc.text: Computes the previous index of an array, clipping if necessary. * It is assumed (but not checked) that {@code i} is smaller than the size * of the array.
